thread.title: Price leak reveals the Galaxy S8 will be significantly cheaper than the iPhone 8
thread.title_full: Price leak reveals the Galaxy S8 will be significantly cheaper than the iPhone 8

author: Alex
title: Price leak reveals the Galaxy S8 will be significantly cheaper than the iPhone 8
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
If you’re on the fence about whether to go iPhone or Android when the latest models come out, here’s some news that might lean you towards the latter. 
A price leak revealed that the Samsung Galaxy S8 will be significantly cheaper than the iPhone 8. The Galaxy will cost around $860 while the iPhone is expected to cost around $1,000. 2 
Android releases never garner the hype that Apple products do (did you know the new Galaxy comes out in just over a week? — I didn’t!), but this leak could turn some heads. There’s no swaying the Apple die-hards, but people fed up with the finnicky cloud or all their accessories becoming obsolete when the port was changed or Apple’s unfathomable to decision to remove the headphone jack might be willing to jump ship. 
Oh, about that last part — rumors say the Galaxy won’t have a headphone jack either. WHY DO YOU THIS TO US, COMPUTERS!? 
Samsung will also offer a slightly larger Galaxy S8+ for $971. Both S8 models are rumored to include the ability to turn into an Android-based computer via dock, and eliminate the home button. 
Maybe Samsung’s price drop is due to careful engineering and an attempt to undercut the increasingly expensive iPhone. Or maybe they have to compensate because the last model would blow your dick off . 3
